translation.en: [man] Hey! Where's the drums?
Shark!
Shark!
Shark!
Help!
Help!
Gina! Lizzie! See if you can scare them off. Go!
translation.zh:
‎吉娜！莉齐！
‎试试能不能把鲨鱼吓跑 快去！

translation.en: Tyler. Eric. Get him out of there.
translation.zh: ‎泰勒、埃里克 把他救出来

translation.en: Come on, man.
You're safe now.
Who are you guys?
Oh, us?
We're Malibu Junior Rescue.
Do you have to say the "Junior" part? It makes us sound like weenies.
translation.zh:
‎能不说“少年”吗？
‎这让我们显得像小屁孩儿

translation.en: Lizzie says I make it sound cool.
Dude, she's your girlfriend.
Lizzie thinks everything you do is cool.
translation.zh: ‎不管你做什么 她都会觉得很酷

translation.en: She's pretty great, isn't she?
Hang on to your butts!
Hey!
Come back!
Dylan, Tyler fell overboard!
[Tyler] Hey!
Hey!
Are you okay?
I am now.
You saved me, Dylan.
You're amazing.
[high-pitched voice] What was that?
Mom, I just had the weirdest dream.
translation.zh: ‎妈妈 我刚做了史上最奇怪的梦

translation.en: [mother's voice] What was it, sweetheart?
Dylan, you okay?
Yeah, I'm fine.
I thought I saw a thing. [chuckles]
I didn't.
So, first day back at Junior Rescue. You excited?
translation.zh:
‎今天是你第一天回到少年救生队
‎激动吗？

translation.en: So excited!
I can't wait to see everybody. Gina, Lizzie, Eric.
translation.zh:
‎我迫不及待想见到大家
‎吉娜、莉齐和埃里克

translation.en: And Tyler?
-I said Tyler. -No, you didn't.
Oh, yeah. Well, sure.
Him too.
-Not, like, more than everybody else. -[mouths]
You know, the same as everybody else. Like equal to.
-Mom, we're just friends. -Okay.
Uh! I can't with you right now.
The International Junior Rescue Championship is this week.
translation.zh:
‎国际少年救生锦标赛
‎这周就要开始了

translation.en: I have to get to the beach to help set up! [sniffs]
I don't have Tyler for this!
Uh, Dylan?
I heard it.
Roger wants everybody there early.
He sent, like, 40 e-mails reminding us. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎他发了有40封邮件来提醒我们

translation.en: As if anybody could forget.
I forgot!
Hey!
I'm sorry!
How could you forget? I sent, like, 40 e-mails!
translation.zh: ‎你怎么能忘呢？我发了40封邮件！

translation.en: Nobody my age checks e-mail!
translation.zh: ‎我们这年纪的年轻人都不查邮件

translation.en: Look, Junior Rescue doesn't even officially start until next week.
translation.zh:
‎听着 少年救生队
‎要到下周才正式开始

translation.en: Why are we leaving so early?
Hello?
The teams are arriving.
For the Beachmaster?
The international competition we're hosting?
translation.zh: ‎我们不是要举办国际比赛吗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah, right. That's today. I remember seeing that somewhere.
translation.zh:
‎对哦 那就是今天
‎我之前好像在哪儿看到过

translation.en: It was in the e-mail!
[sighs] Look, I'm not even competing in the thing. Why do I have to be there?
translation.zh: ‎我又不参加比赛 去那儿干什么呢？

translation.en: Just get in.
What's going on?
Dad, you told him to be at the car by 7:00,
translation.zh: ‎爸爸 你让他七点钟准时上车

translation.en: or you'd leave without him.
How can you expect anyone to respect your authority
translation.zh: ‎如果你任由你的继子摆布你

translation.en: if your own stepson walks all over you?
translation.zh: ‎怎么会有人尊重你的权威呢？

translation.en: You're right.
This is my first year in charge of Junior Rescue.
translation.zh: ‎这是我掌管少年救生队的第一年

translation.en: I can't have anyone questioning my leadership. Sorry, Tyler.
translation.zh:
‎我不能让任何人质疑我的领导地位
‎抱歉 泰勒

translation.en: [Tyler] How am I supposed to get to Malibu?
Did somebody say Malibu?
Vooch? How did you know I was gonna need a ride?
translation.zh: ‎伍奇？你怎么知道我需要乘车？

translation.en: I'm a bus driver, man. It's what I do!
translation.zh:
‎哥们 我是巴士司机啊
‎这是我的工作！

translation.en: Eric told me you'd probably oversleep.
translation.zh: ‎埃里克跟我说 你可能会睡过头

translation.en: So we told Vooch to come get you.
-Also that. -Is there anyone sweeter than Eric?
translation.zh:
‎-那是另一个原因
‎-埃里克太贴心了！

translation.en: Wait, where is he?
Art is life!
Life is pain.
This is a doughnut.
Are we supposed to paint the doughnut?
No.
I eat the doughnut.
You make art. [chuckles]
Welcome to summer school.
I can do a pretty good Garfield.
Guess I'll just paint that.
The whole school year, I texted Eric during sixth period,
translation.zh:
‎整个学年
‎我都会在第六节课给埃里克发短信

translation.en: which was my free period.
I thought it was his free period too, but it wasn't. That's when he had art.
translation.zh:
‎我以为他也没课 但事实并非如此
‎他那时有美术课

translation.en: So instead of leaving her on read, the dummy failed art.
translation.zh:
‎那傻瓜宁愿美术课不合格
‎也不愿意让信息已读不回

translation.en: Now he has to retake it in summer school.
translation.zh: ‎他现在得上暑期学校 重修美术课

translation.en: We gotta get him out of there.
What's our play? Gas the room?
translation.zh: ‎该怎么办？往教室里投催泪弹吗？

translation.en: Tranq the teacher? Unleash an army of squirrels?
translation.zh:
‎向老师发射麻醉镖？
‎放出松鼠军队？

translation.en: A little peanut butter and an acorn,
those fuzzy-tailed rats will do anything you want.
translation.zh: ‎就能让这尾巴毛茸茸的老鼠百依百顺

translation.en: Or we just let Eric get an education.
translation.zh: ‎我们也可以让埃里克好好上课

translation.en: Not on my watch.
Tyler.
Here's that Eric dummy I was telling you about.
translation.zh: ‎这就是我跟你说的那个埃里克假人

translation.en: Why do you have an Eric dummy?
Oh, I have dummies of all you guys.
It's how I take the carpool lane on the weekends.
translation.zh: ‎这样周末我就能走共乘车道了！

translation.en: Hey! I was carrying that.
Whoa, whoa! Whoa, whoa whoa! Let me get that from you.
-Hey, I was gonna put that up. -I know.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 我正要把那架起来呢
‎-我知道

translation.en: And you were doing such a good job,
but why don't you let one of the big kids handle it, okay?
translation.zh: ‎但让哥哥姐姐帮你吧 行吗？

translation.en: So, where's Tyler?
Who cares?
Definitely not me. I don't care.
Don't even know why I asked. [laughs]
Oh, look! There's Dirk and Beans!
Get that grill fired up, boys. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎小子们 让烤架烧起来吧！

translation.en: Okay.
Oh, where are they?
Why is everybody so worried about where Tyler and his dumb friends are?
translation.zh:
‎为什么所有人都这么担心
‎泰勒和他那些白痴朋友在哪儿？

translation.en: What? No, not Tyler. I'm talking about Team USA.
translation.zh: ‎什么？我没说泰勒 说的是美国队

translation.en: Tyler and his friends can't handle the Beachmaster.
translation.zh:
‎泰勒和他的朋友的水平
‎参加不了海滩大师杯

translation.en: There's too much riding on it.
International teams are gonna be here any minute.
We cannot be late to our own welcome barbecue.
translation.zh:
‎我们是东道主
‎不能连去自家的欢迎烧烤会都迟到

translation.en: Dad, is Junior Junior Rescue really a thing?
translation.zh: ‎爸爸 真的有小少年救援队吗？

translation.en: Or did you not want to pay for camp while Mom and Jake were out of town?
translation.zh:
‎还是你只是不想在妈妈和杰克出城时
‎花钱送我去参加夏令营？

translation.en: 'Cause nobody's letting me do anything.
Well, I mean...
No, it's not. But when you think about it, it could be.
translation.zh: ‎其实不存在 ‎但如果你仔细想想 可能会成真哦

translation.en: Oh, finally. Ha ha ha! It's Team USA!
Dang! That Jeep is on-brand.
translation.zh: ‎牛逼！ ‎那辆吉普真符合品牌形象

translation.en: [through bullhorn] What's up?
Hey, Grandma, move it! That spot is for Team USA!
translation.zh:
‎喂 老太婆 快让开！
‎那是美国队的专属位置！

translation.en: Spence, would you honk at her?
translation.zh: ‎斯潘塞 能不能对她按喇叭？

translation.en: Don't honk at her.
Spence, so help me, if you don't get honking!
translation.zh:
‎斯潘塞 帮帮我吧
‎如果你不按喇叭…

translation.en: Don't do it.
Yo, are we jerks, or are we good guys?
'Cause I'm getting really mixed signals here.
translation.zh: ‎因为我收到的信号很不一致啊

translation.en: Those guys have won the Beachmaster four years in a row.
translation.zh: ‎那些人连续四年赢得了海滩大师杯

translation.en: No one's ever won it five.
And when we do, [laughs] we can kiss all our troubles goodbye!
translation.zh:
‎要是我们成功了
‎就能挥别所有麻烦了！

translation.en: -What troubles? -What troubles? Who said troubles?
translation.zh:
‎-什么麻烦？
‎-什么麻烦？谁说麻烦了？

translation.en: I didn't say troubles. You did. Look, all I'm trying to say is,
translation.zh:
‎我没说麻烦 是你说的
‎听着 我想说的就是

translation.en: with Brody, Spencer, Presley, Izzy, and the Chooch, we got this on lock.
translation.zh:
‎有了布罗迪、斯潘塞、普雷斯利
‎依奇和乔奇 我们胜券在握

translation.en: Didn't the Chooch graduate high school, like, three years ago?
translation.zh:
‎乔奇不是在三年前
‎就从高中毕业了吗？

translation.en: Four, actually.
You are the vessels. Let your muse guide your hands.
translation.zh: ‎你们就是载体 ‎让你们的手顺着灵感走

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, Eric.
Yes, that's it. Release your art.
translation.zh: ‎对 就是那样 ‎释放你们的艺术

translation.en: Release it. Everyone release.
translation.zh: ‎释放出来 ‎所有人都释放出来

translation.en: I don't think you're releasing. Let the paint flow. [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎你们应该还没有释放
‎让颜料流动起来吧

translation.en: [Eric] I totally thought I was gonna miss seeing the Beachmaster.
translation.zh:
‎我真的以为会错过
‎亲眼观摩海滩大师杯的机会

translation.en: Thanks for busting me out of summer school, you guys.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你们把我从暑期学校救出来

translation.en: It's so great to see you!
Did you get a haircut?
-It looks amazing. -[chuckles]
-Well-- -[Tyler] Really?
I just went in for a trim, and I was afraid my guy took too much off,
translation.zh:
‎我只是稍微修剪了一下
‎我害怕理发师剪了太多

translation.en: but you saying that really makes me feel--
Um, I think he was talking to me. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎但你那么说让我感觉太… ‎那话应该是对我说的

translation.en: But your hair looks great, too.
Thanks, man!
One year later, and you two are exactly the same dorks you were when you left each other.
translation.zh:
‎一年之后
‎你们俩还是和去年一样傻

translation.en: [Eric and Tyler] Yeah, we are!
♪ Whoa, oh, oh, oh-oh ♪
This coleslaw expired the year I was born!
translation.zh:
‎这凉拌卷心菜
‎在我出生那年就过期了！

translation.en: We cannot serve this.
[man] Babe, you can't just go for a swim.
-[bus horn plays "Pop! Goes the Weasel"] -[gasps] They're here!
You guys!
-Hi. -[Lizzie] Hey, Dylan.
Come here.
Okay, I'm calling it. This hug's done.
[Vooch] There she is.
There was definitely something between us last year.
translation.zh:
‎我们去年一定是
‎产生了特别的感情

translation.en: But what if it's gone?
What if I'm too late?
Vooch, do you mind?
Just saying what everybody's thinking, man.
translation.zh: ‎哥们 我就是把大家的想法说出来

translation.en: [laughing] Okay, bye.
[Lizzie] Hey! How are you?
Hey.
Hi.
-[horn honking] -Look alive, people!
It's showtime.
[Roger laughing] Yeah! Yes!
Hello!
Hola.
Bonjour.
Konnichiwa.
Shalom.
[Australian accent] G'day, mates.
Am I saying that right? "Mates"?
-Uh... -[Roger chuckles] Okay.
Those are the best Junior Rescuers in the world? They don't seem so great.
translation.zh:
‎他们就是全世界
‎最厉害的少年救生员？ ‎看起来不怎么样

translation.en: [Roger] Hey, superhero.
That was pretty great.
Pssh, whatever. I do stuff like that all the time.
translation.zh: ‎随便吧 那把戏我都玩腻了

translation.en: [Dylan] That's Team Australia.
They're, like, Team USA's biggest rival.
This is so exciting. We can learn from them, train with them...
translation.zh:
‎这太激动人心了
‎我们可以向他们学习、一起训练…

translation.en: -[sizzling] -...and apparently, make lunch for them.
This is humiliating.
[Tyler] I know, right?
-[sizzling] -I got a man down here!
Pulling a burger out of the coals isn't the kind of rescuing
translation.zh: ‎没想到我们这个暑假的救援工作

translation.en: I thought we'd be doing this summer.
translation.zh: ‎就是从煤堆里把汉堡肉拉出来

translation.en: -[applause, PA feedback] -Thank you. Thank you.
Welcome to the 2020 International Beachmaster competition!
translation.zh:
‎欢迎来到2020年
‎国际海滩大师杯比赛！

translation.en: You are the most elite Junior Rescue teams in the world,
translation.zh:
‎这里汇聚了全世界
‎最顶尖的少年救生队

translation.en: and we are thrilled to have you here in beautiful Malibu!
translation.zh:
‎能把你们请到美丽的马里布
‎让我们非常激动！

translation.en: Please, please.
Our sand is your sand.
translation.zh: ‎我们的沙子就是你们的沙子

translation.en: Our seas are your seas.
Train, enjoy, and this Friday, may the best team win!
translation.zh:
‎好好训练、好好享受这里
‎愿最优秀的队伍在周五胜出！

translation.en: -[all cheering] -He's talking about us!
-Let's go! [grunts] -Whoo! Yeah!
I can't believe we have to serve food
translation.zh: ‎不敢相信 我们得给大家盛吃的

translation.en: while Brody gets to strut around like big, dumb...
translation.zh:
‎而布罗迪可以招摇过市
‎就像是又大又蠢的…

translation.en: Brody.
I don't know why those guys get to be Team USA.
translation.zh: ‎不知道为什么那些人可以进入美国队

translation.en: We saved the beach last year.
Just 'cause they're from Malibu, they're automatically better than us?
translation.zh:
‎因为他们来自马里布
‎就一定比我们强吗？

translation.en: We could've been Team USA.
Why didn't Roger give us a chance to try out?
translation.zh: ‎为什么罗杰不给我们机会试试？

translation.en: What's that, Valley?
You think you can be Team USA, huh?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得自己可以代表美国队？

translation.en: I got two words for that.
Chyeah. You wish.
We're the Dream Team, man. We've won this thing four years in a row.
translation.zh:
‎我们是梦之队 哥们
‎我们蝉联了四届冠军

translation.en: One more and we will have the longest winning streak in Beachmaster history.
translation.zh:
‎再赢一次 我们就会成为
‎海滩大师杯史上连胜纪录最长的队伍

translation.en: The longest streak you've ever had was in your shorts.
translation.zh: ‎你最长的纪录是内裤里屎印子

translation.en: [laughs] Spence?
Hey-- Hey, Spence!
Guess what I said about Tyler's shorts.
[laughs] You're gonna love it.
Well, that guy's a real drongo, mate.
Yeah, he is.
Unless that means "cool guy," in which case, he is not.
translation.zh:
‎除非你的意思是他很酷
‎那就不对了

translation.en: Yeah. No, it's, uh, Aussie for "idiot."
translation.zh: ‎不 那是澳洲人说“白痴”的意思

translation.en: Well, then, yes, he is a major drongo.
translation.zh: ‎那没错 他是个十足的二货

translation.en: Hey, I'm Tyler.
Wayno. Cheers for the burger, brother. Catch you around, yeah?
translation.zh:
‎我叫维诺 谢谢你的汉堡 哥们
‎回头见吧 好吗？

translation.en: Well, he seemed nice.
[Brody] Hey, Valley!
Don't forget to toast my buns!
I said toast my buns!
[groans] I'm out of slaw here.
Fret not. Eric to the rescue!
I can get it.
No, Eric. Not that one.
translation.zh: ‎不 埃里克 那桶不能吃

translation.en: That one's rotten. I'll get a new one.
translation.zh: ‎发霉了 我去拿一桶新的

translation.en: [Brody] USA! USA! USA!
Is hungry!
[laughing] In his shorts!
Here you go, Brody. Gave you a little extra coleslaw.
translation.zh:
‎给 布罗迪
‎我给你多盛了点儿卷心菜沙拉

translation.en: Ssh! Don't tell anybody.
Oh, my God.
This slaw...
...is amazing!
-Spencer, try this! -Wait. No, no. Wait, wait.
translation.zh: ‎斯潘塞 你试试！ ‎等等 别吃

translation.en: [Brody] Eat up.
-Yo, this slaw is legit! -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-这卷心菜沙拉太好吃了！
‎-对啊

translation.en: It's like it's creamy, but it burns.
No, Presley!
Weird. It's like I hate it, but I also can't stop eating it!
translation.zh: ‎怪了 我既讨厌它 却又欲罢不能！

translation.en: [Tyler] Uh, guys-- Uh, guys, seriously!
-[Brody] Wait, wait! -[Tyler] Come on!
It makes my teeth sting.
[Brody] Hey. Easy, buddy.
-What do you think you're doing? -I think I overcooked this burger.
translation.zh:
‎-你在搞什么呢？
‎-我好像把汉堡烤焦了

translation.en: -Here, let me get you a new one. -Hey! Bring back more of that funky slaw.
translation.zh:
‎-我去给你重新做一个
‎-喂！再多盛点儿臭卷心菜沙拉

translation.en: The Chooch just finished mine.
[grunts] Good thing we got a new one.
Could you imagine if somebody actually ate that stuff?
translation.zh: ‎要是有人吃了刚刚那桶里的就完蛋了

translation.en: Oh, no!
[crying] I'm sorry!
Oh, man, this is not good.
Wait, wait, wait. Don't take me away. Don't take me away. I'm feeling a little bit better. [farts]
translation.zh: ‎等等 别把我带走 我感觉好点儿了

translation.en: [grunts] Oh, take me away! Take me away!
-This is a nightmare. -[siren chirping]
[Tyler] Roger, it-- It's gonna be okay.
Look, I'm sure they'll be feeling better by tomorrow.
The paramedic says it's the worst case of food poisoning she's ever seen.
translation.zh:
‎急救人员说这是她见过的
‎最严重的食物中毒事件

translation.en: They want us to seal those port-a-potties in cement and bury them in the desert.
translation.zh:
‎他们让我们用胶水把流动厕所封起来
‎然后埋到沙漠里

translation.en: Okay, Lizzie, we get it! They're sick. Do we have to keep talking about it?
translation.zh:
‎莉齐 我们明白！他们病得很重
‎但非得说个没完吗？

translation.en: It's just a lot of potty talk,
and I think that we're better than that, that's all.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得我们不用一直说
‎就这样而已

translation.en: Well, that's that.
What's what?
No Team USA means no win.
translation.zh: ‎没有美国队 就意味着赢不了了

translation.en: No win means no streak. And no streak means no world record.
translation.zh:
‎赢不了就意味着没法连胜
‎没法连胜就意味着没有世界纪录

translation.en: I think we all know what that means.
translation.zh: ‎大家应该都知道那意味着什么

translation.en: Uh, no, we don't.
Look, I didn't wanna have to tell you guys this, but...
translation.zh: ‎听着 我不想跟你们说这事 但…

translation.en: we don't have enough kids signed up for Junior Rescue next week.
translation.zh: ‎报名参加下周少年救生队的人数不够

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
Parents weren't lining up to send their kids to the beach
after that tower blew up last year.
translation.zh:
‎今年家长们没有排队
‎送孩子们到海滩了

translation.en: But, like, no towers have blown up since then.
translation.zh:
‎但在那之后
‎已经没有塔再爆炸了

translation.en: Yeah, they don't exactly reward you for towers that don't blow up.
translation.zh:
‎对啊 你不会因为塔没有爆炸
‎就得到奖励

translation.en: They just penalize you for the ones that do.
translation.zh: ‎他们只会因为塔爆炸了而处罚你

translation.en: If we won for a fifth time,
we would officially be the greatest Junior Rescue team in the world!
translation.zh:
‎那我们就可以正式成为
‎世界上最优秀的少年救生队！

translation.en: We'd have the trophies to prove it!
Nobody would care about what happened last summer.
translation.zh: ‎没人会在乎去年暑假发生了什么

translation.en: Ah! A record-breaking win by Team USA was exactly the thing we needed
translation.zh: ‎我们正需要美国队打破连胜纪录

translation.en: to inspire a new generation of Junior Rescuers to sign up.
translation.zh: ‎鼓励新一代的少年救生员来报名

translation.en: Well, how many kids do we have?
Three.
Three? That's it?
Quit rubbing it in!
I can tell a bunch of my friends to sign up.
I wield a lot of power in my friend group.
translation.zh: ‎我在朋友圈里地位还挺高的

translation.en: Sasha, ten more little kids isn't gonna solve this problem.
translation.zh: ‎萨莎 多十个小孩儿解决不了这问题

translation.en: Why don't you just let us worry about that?
translation.zh: ‎你别管了 交给我们处理 好吗？

translation.en: Without Team USA's big win,
I don't see how we're gonna get more recruits.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得就招不到更多成员了

translation.en: No more recruits means no more Junior Rescue.
translation.zh:
‎没有新成员
‎就意味着少年救生队也得解散了

translation.en: I'm sorry, guys, but after Friday,
translation.zh: ‎对不起 各位 但周五之后

translation.en: we'll have no choice but to shut the program down.
translation.zh: ‎我们就得把这夏令营取消了

translation.en: What are you looking at?
-Jeffy! Did you find my great big hat? -[music stops]
Oh! You found it.
Who is my best little boy?
You are. You're my best little boy. Come here.
translation.zh: ‎就是你 你就是我最棒的小男孩儿 来

translation.en: Oh, my gosh! Oh! Oh!
We can't just let this happen.
What are we supposed to do?
We'll be Team USA.
Tyler.
We can't just be Team USA.
translation.zh: ‎我们不能随随便便就成为美国队

translation.en: We're not ready.
Tyler, are you serious?
Yes.
Look, we can't let Junior Rescue go without a fight.
translation.zh:
‎看 我们不能不战而退
‎任少年救生队消失

translation.en: We're as good as Brody and those other guys.
translation.zh: ‎我们不比布罗迪那一帮人差

translation.en: Besides, how hard could it be?
Yeah!
That's the Beachmaster?
It is called the Beachmaster. Did you think it was gonna be easy?
translation.zh:
‎名字叫“海滩大师杯”
‎你觉得会很简单吗？

translation.en: I was hoping!
Kind of wishin' I was in summer school right now.
Guys, this isn't The Crucible.
translation.zh: ‎各位 这不是熔炉考核赛

translation.en: The Beachmaster pushes you to your limits.
translation.zh: ‎海滩大师杯会逼你挑战极限

translation.en: Limits you didn't even know you had.
translation.zh: ‎你可能不知道自己那么优秀

translation.en: Okay, Brody and his team have been training all year,
translation.zh:
‎布罗迪和他的队伍
‎已经训练了一整年

translation.en: and we have until Friday. That's, like, four days!
translation.zh: ‎我们只有到周五前那么点儿时间 ‎只有四天！

translation.en: Yeah!
If we don't do anything, Junior Rescue dies. We have to try.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们坐视不理
‎少年救生队就没戏了 我们得搏一搏

translation.en: Look, Dylan, you're with me, right?
translation.zh: ‎迪伦 你是跟我站一边的吧？

translation.en: [laughs] With you? Like, um-- Like with you, with you?
Yeah. Wait, no. Uh, wait. What did you mean?
translation.zh: ‎是 等等 不是 什么意思？

translation.en: What did you mean?
-Nothing, forget it! -Nothing, forget it!
translation.zh:
‎-没什么 算了！
‎-没什么 算了！

translation.en: I can get us ready in four days.
translation.zh: ‎我能让大家在四天内就准备好

translation.en: My dad's a retired drill sergeant.
translation.zh: ‎我爸爸是退休的陆军训练官

translation.en: My entire life has been one big boot camp.
translation.zh: ‎我从小到大就像是一场大训练营

translation.en: I can kill 30 different ways with my thumb.
translation.zh: ‎我用大拇指就有30种杀人的方式

translation.en: Ooh! I wanna learn that.
We just need somebody to train us for the Beachmaster.
translation.zh:
‎我们只需要一个人
‎训练我们为海滩大师杯做准备

translation.en: I can do that.
We're Tower Two.
We saved Junior Rescue last summer, and we can do it again this year.
translation.zh:
‎我们去年拯救了少年救生队
‎今年可以再救一次

translation.en: I can have us ready to win by Friday.
translation.zh:
‎我能在周五之前
‎让大家做好取胜的准备

translation.en: All right, Gina, we're all yours.
translation.zh: ‎好的 吉娜 我们听你的指挥

translation.en: Just tell us what to do.
[whistles] All right, you maggots, your butts belong to me!
translation.zh:
‎好的 小蛆们
‎你们的屁股现在属于我！

translation.en: From here on out, you talk when I say you talk and rest when I say you rest!
translation.zh: ‎现在起 我让你们说话才能说话 ‎我让你们休息才能休息

translation.en: Get a good night's sleep 'cause hell begins tomorrow.
translation.zh:
‎今晚好好睡
‎因为明天就要开始地狱式训练了

translation.en: Wow, that whistle really went to her head. [whistle blares]
translation.zh: ‎哇 那口哨真是冲昏了她的头脑

translation.en: Eric, what are you doing here so early?
translation.zh: ‎埃里克 你这么早来这儿干什么？

translation.en: You're right. You know what? You're right. I shouldn't interrupt.
translation.zh: ‎你做得对 知道吗？ ‎你做得对 我不应该打断你

translation.en: You know, I just have to say,
I find your dedication inspiring, you know?
translation.zh: ‎你的投入鼓舞了我 知道吗？

translation.en: Reminds me of my semester abroad in Paris.
translation.zh: ‎让我想起我到巴黎留学的那学期

translation.en: -[accordion music playing] -Oh, I learned so much that year.
About life, about laughter. [chuckles]
About love.
Gina said to be here at 6:30.
Where is she?
Maybe she overslept?
You wanna know why that just happened? Because you weren't ready!
translation.zh:
‎想知道你为什么会栽倒吗？
‎因为你没准备好！

translation.en: All the teams we're about to face this week have one thing in common.
translation.zh:
‎这周我们要面对的队伍
‎有一个共同点

translation.en: They were actually chosen to compete?
Well, yeah.
-They've been training for months? -Yeah, that too.
translation.zh:
‎-他们训练了好几个月了？
‎-也对

translation.en: They're the pride of their countries,
and we're a bunch of underdogs nobody believes in?
translation.zh: ‎我们只是一群没人看好的弱鸡？

translation.en: I was gonna say they're ready for anything.
translation.zh:
‎我本来想说的是
‎他们准备好面对各种情况

translation.en: The Beachmaster is a grueling obstacle course
translation.zh: ‎海滩大师杯就是充满障碍物的挑战场

translation.en: designed to put lifeguarding's most important skills to the test:
translation.zh: ‎旨在考验救生行动中最重要的技能

translation.en: strength, endurance, agility, and, most importantly, teamwork.
translation.zh:
‎力量、耐力、敏捷性
‎以及最重要的团队合作

translation.en: The team that gets through the course the fastest, wins.
translation.zh: ‎最快穿过挑战场的队伍就是冠军

translation.en: The whole team.
That means we have to work together.
translation.zh: ‎那就是说 我们得互相合作

translation.en: No problem. We're Tower Two. Teamwork is our jam.
translation.zh:
‎没问题 ‎我们是二号救生塔
‎最擅长的就是团队合作

translation.en: Good. Then this should be easy.
Now move your butts! We've got work to do!
translation.zh: ‎行动起来吧！我们有活儿要干呢！

translation.en: -[whistle blares] -[Lizzie] Ooh! Oh, sorry!
-[Tyler] Let's go! -[Gina] Really?
[Dylan] Let's move away from here. Head that way. Okay.
translation.zh: ‎我们走吧 大家往那边走 好

translation.en: Yeah, come on! Let's go, Dylan!
Whoo! Come on! You got this! Move those legs! Let's go! Yeah!
translation.zh:
‎加油！你一定可以！
‎动起来！走吧！对！

translation.en: After you.
-Eric, what are you doing? -Holding the wire for my lady.
translation.zh:
‎-埃里克 你在干什么呢？
‎-为我的女士把线拉起来

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't know you two were out on a date.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 我不知道你们俩在交往

translation.en: I thought we were training for the most important competition of our lives!
translation.zh:
‎我们不是在为
‎人生最重要的比赛训练吗？

translation.en: -Move it! Move it! -[whistle blares]
Let's go! Come on!
Keep it up! Let's go!
Go! Whoo!
-[Tyler] Oh, come on, guys! -[Lizzie] I got it! I got it!
Come on, guys! Teamwork makes the dream work!
translation.zh:
‎加油 各位！
‎团队合作能让梦想成真！

translation.en: Let's go, you maggots! Go! Go! Go!
Come on! Go, slowpoke!
Come on, Eric! Let's go! Let's go! You've got this! Come on! Let's move it!
translation.zh: ‎加油 埃里克！上去！ ‎你能行！加油！动起来！

translation.en: -[Tyler] You got this, Dylan. -[Gina] Good job, Tyler! Come on! Come on!
translation.zh:
‎-你能行 迪伦
‎-好的 泰勒！加油！

translation.en: I got you.
-More training, less flirting! -Uh...
-Sick teamwork, bro. -Nice save, dog!
translation.zh:
‎-天衣无缝 哥们
‎-救得好 小子！

translation.en: Oops! Sorry!
All you have to do is get across this line.
translation.zh: ‎你们需要做的就是越过这条线

translation.en: -That's it? -[Gina] Yep.
This feels like a trap.
If it's a trap, don't worry. I'll protect you.
translation.zh: ‎如果是陷阱 你别担心 我会保护你的

translation.en: I can protect myself.
Guys, it's not a trap!
Then why am I holding a riot shield?
translation.zh: ‎那我为什么要拿着防暴盾牌？

translation.en: Because it is a trap!
Everybody get behind me!
[Lizzie] Come on, Dylan! A couple of more steps! Come on!
translation.zh:
‎-加油啊 迪伦！
‎-再多走几步就到了！加油！

translation.en: Now push! We're almost there!
That's it! Great teamwork!
-[Dylan] God. -[Lizzie] Push! You got it!
translation.zh:
‎-天哪
‎-来 往前推！你们能行！

translation.en: Push!
I told you to be prepared for anything!
translation.zh: ‎我让你们要为一切情况做好准备！

translation.en: You guys, help me with this thing!
[Tyler] We gotta grab it! Okay.
[Dylan] I can't get it.
You guys distract it, and I'll sneak up behind it!
translation.zh:
‎你们转移它的注意力
‎我潜伏到它后方！

translation.en: You can't distract it! It's a hose, you moron!
translation.zh:
‎怎么能转移它的注意力呢？
‎这是根水管啊 笨蛋！

translation.en: [Dylan] A little this way.
-[Lizzie] Hey! -[Tyler] A little closer.
[Dylan] I can't.
-Grab it! Somebody grab it! -[Gina] I got it! I got it!
translation.zh: ‎抓住！找个人把它抓住啊！ ‎我来！

translation.en: Don't worry. I got it.
Hey, settle down, sunshine.
This is a job for a big fella, not a little wallaby like you.
translation.zh:
‎这活儿是大人干的
‎你这种沙袋鼠干不来

translation.en: We did it!
Yes! We killed it!
Uh, guys?
Everybody okay?
Yeah, we're just doing a little training.
translation.zh: ‎挺好的 刚刚只是稍微训练一下

translation.en: Ah. Sorry.
Do you, uh, want me to turn it back on, do ya?
[all] No!
Look, we're kind of wrapping it up, anyway.
-You guys all right? -Depends. How much of that did you see?
translation.zh:
‎你们没事吧？ ‎得看情况而论
‎你们刚刚看到了多少？

translation.en: All of it, mate.
Well, then, we've been better.
I'm Eric!
Oh! I'm Kezza.
And that's Johnno, Shaz, Carli, and that's Wayno.
translation.zh:
‎他们分别是乔诺、莎思、卡莉
‎那位是维诺

translation.en: So, you guys are the new Team USA?
translation.zh: ‎所以你们是新组成的美国队？

translation.en: Looks like we got some stiff competition, boys?
translation.zh:
‎看来我们要面对激烈的竞争了
‎对吗 小伙子们？

translation.en: Don't worry. We'll be ready by Friday.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 我们会在周五前准备好

translation.en: Oh, of course you will be.
You guys are doing a ripper job out there, right, Wayno?
translation.zh: ‎你们干得很棒啊 对吗 维诺？

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
Just messing with you, mate.
translation.zh: ‎就是想跟你开开玩笑 伙计

translation.en: Hey...
you forgot your wrench.
Yeah, it must have been cracked or something.
You guys are in trouble.
Would you get out of here?
Oh, she's right. We are in trouble.
translation.zh: ‎她没说错 我们的确麻烦大了

translation.en: He's been going nonstop for three days. [chuckles] Oh, gosh. Eh!
translation.zh: ‎他没日没夜地画了三天了 ‎天哪

translation.en: Everyone stay on this side of his canvas.
translation.zh: ‎所有人都待在他的画布这边

translation.en: Do not interrupt him.
Come on! Pick it up!
Eric, what are you doing?
-Keeping you company. -You don't have to.
I know. I want to.
Let's go!
Morning, brother.
Going for a little walkey-walkey, are we?
Wish I didn't see that.
I can dig some holes where the other teams will be running.
translation.zh:
‎我可以在其他队伍
‎跑步的地方挖几个洞

translation.en: A few broken ankles would really even the odds.
translation.zh:
‎要是有几个人崴了脚
‎大家就实力相当了

translation.en: That's sweet, honey, but I think it'd be best if you just stayed out of the way.
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的 你真贴心
‎但我觉得你最好别插手

translation.en: Nobody will let me do anything.
Why do you keep making me come to Junior Rescue?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么要一直带我来少年救生队？

translation.en: Oh, don't worry.
If things keep going the way they're going,
there won't be a Junior Rescue to come back to.
translation.zh:
‎以后不会再有少年救生队
‎也用不着回来了

translation.en: [woman shouts] Jeffy!
Where are you?
You seen my great big meatball sandwich?
translation.zh: ‎看到我那大肉丸三明治了吗？

translation.en: -[woman] Jeffy! -[record scratches, music stops]
Where are you?
[Gina] Listen up!
The trick with the cargo net is to move opposing limbs in unison
translation.zh:
‎过吊货网的秘诀
‎就是同步移动对侧的手脚

translation.en: and stick as close as you can to the support beams.
Lizzie, you're up first.
And try not to make me puke.
Come on, Lizzie, move it! Move it!
-[Lizzie grunts] -Uh, I-- I got you!
No, Eric! Let her do it!
-[grunts] I had it! -I know.
-Then why did you come up here? -I-- I just want to be here for you.
translation.zh:
‎-那你为什么要上来？
‎-我就是想陪在你身边

translation.en: Tyler, Dylan. Get in there and show 'em how it's done.
translation.zh:
‎泰勒、迪伦 上吧
‎给他们看看该怎么做

translation.en: -Like together? -We're not together.
-I know that. -What's going on with you two?
Nothing, let's just go.
[Lizzie] Ow! Oh! A lot of movement over there. Ow!
Okay! Okay!
That's Tyler's leg.
Who put this thing--
Ah! Getting a little light-headed!
This went wrong so fast.
[woman] Help!
Hey! Somebody needs our help!
-[woman] Help! -[man] Hey!
-[man] Come on! -[woman] Hey!
We're on it!
-Gina, a little help here? -We have to save them! Come on!
translation.zh:
‎-吉娜 能不能拉我一把？
‎-我们得去救他们！快走！

translation.en: [Wayno] Aussies on this one.
Johnno and Carli, you take the one on the left!
translation.zh: ‎乔诺和卡莉 你们去救左边的人！

translation.en: [Kezza] All right, let's go. Now. Shaz and Johnno, in the water now.
translation.zh:
‎好 现在就去
‎莎思和乔诺 现在下水

translation.en: [Wayno] Let's go. Come on, team. You got it.
translation.zh: ‎快去 来吧 队友们 你们能行

translation.en: Watch out for the rips.
[Wayno] Let's go, team. Come on.
Hey! I said we're on it.
[Wayno] Let's go, team. Come on.
Let's go. You're doing' great. Bring 'em in.
translation.zh: ‎走吧 你们干得很棒 把他们带上岸

translation.en: Okay, bring 'em up. Come on.
[Tyler] Come on!
All right, yeah. That was amazing, Shaz. Good work.
translation.zh: ‎好了 莎思 刚刚完成得很出色 优秀

translation.en: -Good stuff, team. -That was amazing.
translation.zh:
‎-很棒 队友们
‎-刚刚真是太厉害了

translation.en: Is everybody okay?
Oh, yeah. No worries, mate.
We just saw that youse were a bit busy with your net over there,
translation.zh:
‎我们刚刚看到
‎你们在那边的网上忙活

translation.en: so we jumped in.
We didn't mean to show you up or nothing.
-You didn't show us up. -Oh, you reckon, do ya?
translation.zh: ‎你们没有炫技 ‎你是这么想的？

translation.en: We're the ones who saved those shark biscuits
translation.zh: ‎救了那些鲨鱼诱饵的是我们

translation.en: while you were flopping around like a mudskipper going walkabout.
translation.zh:
‎而你们就像离了水
‎在丛林里跳来跳去的弹涂鱼一样

translation.en: I can't tell. Are you guys nice people, or are you not nice people?
translation.zh: ‎我懵了 你们到底是好人还是坏人？

translation.en: Yeah, I thought we kind of bonded over the whole "Brody's a drongo" thing.
translation.zh:
‎对 我以为我们在说“布罗迪是二货”
‎那会儿建立了感情

translation.en: Yeah, look, that's when he was the drongo.
translation.zh: ‎对 听着 当时的二货是他

translation.en: Now you're the drongo, drongo.
translation.zh: ‎现在的二货是你啊 二货

translation.en: I'm coming down on "not nice."
We came here... with one mission...
translation.zh: ‎我们来这里是为了一个使命

translation.en: To destroy Team USA.
I just didn't think it was gonna be this easy, eh?
Good bit of luck with the real team getting sick like that?
translation.zh:
‎真正的队伍病倒了
‎我们运气还不错 对吗？

translation.en: I know what the problem is.
I've been way too easy on you!
I wouldn't say that.
Tomorrow, I drop the hammer!
Don't worry. We'll get through this together.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 我们会一起渡过难关

translation.en: Oh, what? 'Cause I can't do it by myself?
translation.zh:
‎怎么？
‎因为我自己一个人完成不了吗？

translation.en: I didn't mean...
Man, none of this would be happening if Brody and his team hadn't gotten sick.
translation.zh:
‎哥们 要是布罗迪和他的队伍没有病
‎这一切都不会发生

translation.en: Okay, well, they did, okay?
I don't know why you're yelling at me about it!
translation.zh:
‎我不知道
‎你为什么要为这事对我吼？

translation.en: I didn't mean...
What's wrong with Tyler?
How would I know?
It's not like I sit around thinking about Tyler all the time!
translation.zh:
‎我又不是没事干
‎一天到晚只想着泰勒！

translation.en: My head's in the game! [grunts]
I didn't mean...
Actually, I don't know what I meant.
translation.zh: ‎其实我也不知道自己是什么意思

translation.en: Ho! Excuse me.
I didn't realize there was anyone else in the building.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道现在还有别人留在楼里

translation.en: I, too, do my best work after hours.
translation.zh:
‎我也是在下班之后
‎才能发挥出最佳水平

translation.en: I'm in a band.
If you don't mind, I'll give you one of my CDs.
translation.zh:
‎如果你不介意
‎我就送你一张我的CD

translation.en: You could listen to it,
maybe give me a little feedback, one artist to another.
translation.zh:
‎也许能给我一点儿反馈
‎一个艺术家给另一个艺术家的反馈

translation.en: I've got my, uh, e-mail on the back,
and my Twitter handle. Or you could just hit me up on LinkedIn.
translation.zh: ‎还有我的推特用户名 ‎你也可以直接上领英联系我

translation.en: I'd love to make you part of my network.
translation.zh: ‎期待你能加入我的人脉关系

translation.en: I'll just leave this here.
I really like that guy.
Quiet, good listener.
Right.
How ya doing, Gina?
If you're here to trash-talk my team, don't.
translation.zh:
‎如果你是来侮辱我的队伍
‎那就省点儿吧

translation.en: I'm not in the mood.
Oh, no, I'm not here to trash-talk your team.
translation.zh: ‎不是 我不是来侮辱你的队伍的

translation.en: We're all Junior Rescue. We gotta stick together.
translation.zh: ‎我们都属于少年救生队 得团结一致

translation.en: It doesn't matter where we come from.
I'm actually here to give you a little pep talk.
And why would you do that?
Um, because if you go into competition as bad as you are,
translation.zh:
‎因为如果你们
‎以那么差劲的水平去比赛

translation.en: we're gonna look like huge jerks when we kick your bums.
translation.zh:
‎我们打败你们的时候
‎会显得像大混蛋

translation.en: People will be like, "Oh, why'd you humiliate those Yanks?"
translation.zh:
‎大家会说：
‎“为什么要羞辱那些美国佬？”

translation.en: We'll be like, "We didn't mean to. It's not our fault they're incompetent."
translation.zh: ‎我们会说：“不是故意的 ‎他们那么废 不是我们的错”

translation.en: They'll be like, "Too right. They're a bunch of bogans."
translation.zh: ‎他们会说：“对 他们就是草包”

translation.en: And I'll be like, "Hey, hey, hey. Lay off 'em, cause those bogans are our mates."
translation.zh:
‎我会说：“嘿 放过他们吧
‎因为那些草包是我们的朋友”

translation.en: We've just had a couple off days. We're gonna win this thing.
translation.zh:
‎我们只是有几天没在状态
‎我们一定会胜利的

translation.en: Oh, yes. See, look, that's the spirit.
translation.zh: ‎对啊 看 就得有这样的精神

translation.en: And don't even worry about the fact that you're representing your entire country
translation.zh: ‎别想自己代表的是整个国家

translation.en: or that tomorrow you're gonna completely humiliate yourself
translation.zh: ‎不然明天你们就会在全世界面前

translation.en: -in front of the world. -You're trying to get in my head.
translation.zh:
‎-让自己丢脸
‎-你就是试图气我

translation.en: Oh, no, I'm not trying to get in your head. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎没有 我才没有试图气你呢

translation.en: I'm already in there.
And you? [laughs] You don't stand a chance.
Catch you later.
Is it me, or is she even scarier when she's not yelling?
translation.zh:
‎是我想多了吗？
‎还是大家都觉得她不出声时更可怕？

translation.en: She's "Mom mad." That's the maddest you can be.
translation.zh:
‎她是生的是妈妈级的气
‎就是生气的最高级别

translation.en: Do you want to lose tomorrow?
Speaking for me and Lizzie?
-No. -Eric, I can speak for myself.
translation.zh:
‎-不想
‎-埃里克 我可以代表自己发言

translation.en: -No. -'Cause it feels like you wanna lose.
translation.zh:
‎-不想
‎-因为你们显得很想失败

translation.en: I've been racking my brain trying to figure out
translation.zh: ‎我已经绞尽脑汁 试图想明白

translation.en: how you could possibly be this bad,
and all I could come up with is that you hate Junior Rescue.
translation.zh:
‎我唯一能想到的原因
‎就是你们很讨厌少年救生队

translation.en: Well, you need to reexamine your conclusions,
because we love Junior Rescue.
translation.zh: ‎因为我们很热爱少年救生队

translation.en: Well, you're not training like you love it.
translation.zh: ‎你们的训练状态显得你们毫不热爱

translation.en: You're training like a bunch of bogans.
translation.zh: ‎你们训练时显得像一群草包

translation.en: What's a bogan?
It's what you're training like!
You're distracted, and your teamwork sucks.
translation.zh: ‎你们心不在焉 完全没有默契

translation.en: We've got one more day to get ready.
But you have to want it.
translation.zh: ‎但你们得心怀对成功的渴望

translation.en: All of you. Do you want to win?
translation.zh: ‎所有人都得有 你们想赢吗？

translation.en: Of course we do.
Then what's the problem?
They're way better than us.
You're trying to steal our secrets, are ya?
translation.zh: ‎你们是想偷走我们的秘密吗？

translation.en: I mean, you can if you want.
You still don't have a prayer. Ha ha!
You see that?
That thing I just did.
That was sweet as, right?
Let's see what you got, Team Drongo.
translation.zh: ‎二货队 让我们看看你们的本事吧

translation.en: -That was awesome, mate. So sick. -That was good, right?
translation.zh:
‎-太厉害了 哥们 真绝
‎-很不错吧？

translation.en: [sighs] Four days isn't enough time.
I thought I could get us ready, but I was wrong.
translation.zh:
‎我以为我能让我们做好准备
‎但我错了

translation.en: I'm sorry I let you down.
No, we let you down.
translation.zh: ‎不是 是我们让你失望了

translation.en: Yeah. We could have trained harder.
translation.zh: ‎对 我们原本可以更加努力地训练

translation.en: I mean, every time I try to sit, I go, "Ow."
translation.zh:
‎我是说 我每次想坐下的时候
‎都会心想：“哎哟”

translation.en: I think I could've given a little more.
Gina, we weren't even supposed to be doing this.
translation.zh: ‎吉娜 这不是我们的义务

translation.en: If Brody and the guys hadn't got sick--
Okay, fine! It's my fault! Is that what you wanted me to say?
translation.zh:
‎好了！全赖我！
‎你们是想听我这么说吗？

translation.en: Dude, what did you do?
Brody was strutting around at the barbecue bragging that he was Team USA,
translation.zh:
‎布罗迪在烧烤聚餐上显摆
‎炫耀自己代表美国队

translation.en: and we weren't. So I pulled a prank on him.
translation.zh: ‎而我们不是 所以我就捉弄他了

translation.en: I gave him that rotten coleslaw.
translation.zh: ‎我把那发臭的卷心菜沙拉给他吃了

translation.en: Tyler, why would you do that?
translation.zh: ‎泰勒 你为什么要那么做？

translation.en: I didn't know everybody else was gonna eat it.
And I definitely didn't know they were gonna get sick.
That coleslaw was 17 years old, man.
translation.zh: ‎哥们 那卷心菜沙拉放了有17年了

translation.en: What'd you think was gonna happen?
I wasn't thinking, okay?
This whole year I was so excited to come back to Junior Rescue.
translation.zh:
‎这一整年
‎我日思夜盼 想回到少年救生队

translation.en: Now there might not even be a Junior Rescue.
translation.zh: ‎现在少年救生队可能要解散了

translation.en: Because of me.
Where do you think you're going, soldier? Hey, you get back here!
translation.zh: ‎士兵 你要去哪儿呢？给我回来！

translation.en: That's an order!
[sighs] Can you believe him?
I bet we would have had a shot at this thing
if the Aussies hadn't gotten in our heads.
translation.zh: ‎我们原本一定有胜出的机会

translation.en: I wish they would get food poisoning.
translation.zh: ‎要是能让他们食物中毒就好了

translation.en: I don't actually mean that. I'm just having a lot of feelings now.
translation.zh: ‎开个玩笑而已 我现在只是百感交集

translation.en: Give it a rest, kid.
[woman] Jeffy! You seen my radio?
-[music clicks off] -[woman] Jeffy!
Hey! Get back here! What are you-- Ow! Ow!
God! Stubbed my big toe on this giant heart made out of rocks!
translation.zh:
‎天哪！我不小心把大脚趾踢到
‎这用石头做的巨型爱心上了！

translation.en: Jeffy, did you put this here?
Is this you?
Hey, get back here! Jeffy!
[Brody] Mom!
I'm all out of juice!
Mom!
Hey, you're not my mom!
What are you doing in my room?
Just wanted to stop by, see how you're doing.
My tummy's still a little bit rumbly, but... I guess I feel a bit better.
translation.zh:
‎我的肚子还是不太舒服
‎但好像好受一点儿了

translation.en: Well, that's great. That's great news.
translation.zh: ‎太好了 真是振奋人心啊

translation.en: You and the team can still get out and win this thing. Come on, man.
translation.zh:
‎那你和队伍还是能去打赢这场比赛
‎走吧 哥们

translation.en: What are you, crazy?
I haven't eaten solid food in four days. I can't stand up without getting dizzy,
translation.zh: ‎我已经四天没有吃固体食物了 ‎我一站起来就头晕

translation.en: and my doctor says I have the butthole of a 65-year-old man!
translation.zh:
‎我的医生说
‎我的屁眼已经和65岁老头的一样了

translation.en: Look, there's something I gotta tell you.
I knew that coleslaw was expired.
translation.zh: ‎我知道那卷心菜沙拉已经过期了

translation.en: But for the record, you were supposed to spit it out.
translation.zh:
‎但我要郑重声明
‎你们本应该把它吐出来

translation.en: This is...
awesome. [laughs]
-You're not mad? -Oh, no, I'm furious.
I was supposed to make history this year.
This whole time, I have been thinking I let everyone down.
translation.zh: ‎我一直在想我让所有人失望了

translation.en: But you let everyone down!
Trust me. I feel worse about it than you do.
translation.zh: ‎相信我 我比你感到更糟糕

translation.en: Oh, I guarantee you that is not true.
You were right, man. I'm not Team USA material.
translation.zh: ‎你说得对 哥们 ‎我不是美国队那块料

translation.en: -Duh. -We can't do this. We can't win it.
Oh, boo-hoo-hoo! Look at me. I'm Tyler. I'm a big crybaby.
translation.zh: ‎看看我 我是泰勒 是个大爱哭鬼

translation.en: You wanna know why you're so annoying?
translation.zh: ‎想知道你为什么这么烦人吗？

translation.en: Not really.
It's because you never give up.
Oh, my God, it drives me crazy. It is by far your worst quality.
translation.zh:
‎天哪 这要把我逼疯了
‎这是你至今最讨厌的品质

translation.en: -Uh, thanks? -So why are you giving up now?
translation.zh:
‎-这是夸我吗？
‎-那你现在为什么要放弃？

translation.en: The Beachmaster is tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎海滩大师杯明天就要开始了

translation.en: You screwed this up.
You need to fix it. You should be out there kicking butt,
translation.zh:
‎所以你就得负责解决
‎你应该在那边秒杀对手

translation.en: but you're in my bedroom crying like a giant wuss.
translation.zh:
‎但你却在我的房间里面
‎像娘炮一样哭哭啼啼的

translation.en: That's not the Tyler I know and hate.
translation.zh: ‎那不是我认识和讨厌的泰勒

translation.en: So you're saying I felt so bad about what I did I lost my edge?
translation.zh:
‎你是说我为自己做的事感到太内疚
‎以至于看不到自己的优势？

translation.en: -I don't remember saying that. -You mean mistakes are in the past.
translation.zh: ‎我好像没那么说 ‎你是说犯的错误都过去了

translation.en: Best way to make it right is do better in the future?
translation.zh:
‎最好的纠错方法
‎就是在未来做得更好？

translation.en: What you talking about?
translation.zh:
‎-你在说什么啊？
‎-你说得对 兄弟

translation.en: You're right, man! Look, I can't give up!
translation.zh:
‎-你在说什么啊？
‎-你说得对 兄弟 ‎看 我不能放弃

translation.en: I owe it to you and my team and all of Junior Rescue to fix this.
translation.zh:
‎我有义务解决 这是我欠你
‎我的队伍和整支少年救生队的

translation.en: Well, yeah, that's true, but--
This is huge, Brody!
-Thanks, man. -Oh! Get off me.
You better not tell anybody I inspired you!
translation.zh:
‎你最好别告诉别人
‎是我让你开窍的！

translation.en: Hug was kinda nice, though.
Of all the days for your brother to be late, it had to be today.
So irresponsible.
I cannot believe it-- Gah!
Took you long enough.
Please promise me you're gonna win this thing today.
translation.zh: ‎请你向我保证 你们今天会赢得冠军

translation.en: I'll promise you this: we're not gonna give up.
translation.zh: ‎我能向你保证的是：我们不会放弃

translation.en: That is not what I asked you to promise me.
What are you smirking about back there?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么在后面笑得这么诡异？

translation.en: Just got a feeling that today might work out.
translation.zh: ‎直觉告诉我 今天可能会成功

translation.en: Aw! You got faith in your big bro?
Ew. No, gross.
Hey, Lizzie!
Does Eric have a goldfish?
'Cause, uh, he's acting like it died.
translation.zh: ‎他现在的样子好像家里死了金鱼一样

translation.en: I'm sorry I've been so snappy lately.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 我最近脾气不太好

translation.en: It's fine.
Totally fine. I can't even remember what it was about.
translation.zh:
‎真的没关系
‎我连你是为什么生气都记不清了

translation.en: So, what was it about?
You should've told me I was texting you during art class.
translation.zh:
‎你应该告诉我
‎我给你发信息的时候你在上美术课

translation.en: What?
All year long, you let me think that we were texting during your free period,
translation.zh:
‎一整年 你都让我以为
‎我们发信息的时候你没有课

translation.en: but you were really failing art.
Because that's when you wanted to talk.
translation.zh: ‎但你只有在那时才想聊天啊

translation.en: I wanted to be there for you.
I know you're there for me.
But you don't have to protect me like that.
translation.zh: ‎但你不需要用那种方式保护我

translation.en: You don't have to slow down for me or try and save me.
translation.zh:
‎你不需要为了等我而慢下来
‎或试着救我

translation.en: And you don't have to pretend you don't have art class when you do.
translation.zh:
‎你不需要在上美术课的时候
‎假装不用上美术课

translation.en: You're not gonna hurt my feelings.
I'm not gonna get mad.
I can take care of myself.
I know.
I guess I was just trying to be the perfect boyfriend.
translation.zh: ‎我猜我只是想当完美的男朋友

translation.en: You don't have to be perfect.
Just be you.
That's the Eric I love.
Did you just say you love me?
Yes, but I also said a bunch of other stuff,
translation.zh: ‎对 但我还说了一大堆别的话

translation.en: and it's really important to me that you heard it.
I heard it. And I won't do anything for you ever again.
translation.zh:
‎我听清楚了
‎我以后什么都不为你做了

translation.en: -Just kidding. -[Lizzie chuckles]
So, uh, you love me, huh?
Oh, God. Is this the 8:15 to Barf City?
translation.zh:
‎天哪 这是8点15分出发
‎去呕吐之城的班车吗？

translation.en: [Vooch] What?
No!
This is the bus to Malibu!
Gina, it's me.
The Vooch.
Guys? Now I'm concerned about Gina.
translation.zh: ‎你们听着 我现在有点儿担心吉娜

translation.en: [Dylan] Sorry!
Don't worry! I got it!
Dude.
Dude.
Dude?
Dude?
Dude.
Dude.
My dudes! [squeals]
That was beautiful.
I don't get it.
[man over PA] Welcome, everyone.
It's a beautiful day for the International Beachmaster competition!
translation.zh:
‎天公作美 在这天气下
‎举行国际海滩大师杯比赛再好不过了

translation.en: We are live in Malibu, where the best Junior Rescuers in the world have gathered
translation.zh:
‎我们现在在马里布做现场直播 ‎这里汇聚了
‎全世界最优秀的少年救生员

translation.en: to compete in the ultimate lifeguard test of strength, skill, stamina, and teamwork.
translation.zh:
‎将进行终极救生测试
‎比拼能力、技巧、耐力和团队合作

translation.en: They've come from all over the world
for a chance to be named this year's Beachmaster.
Look, I know I've been kind of a--
translation.zh: ‎听着 我知道自己最近有点儿…

translation.en: Psycho.
I was gonna say "passionate leader," but sure, let's go with that.
translation.zh:
‎我本来打算说“热情的领袖”
‎但就用你的说法吧

translation.en: I just want us to go out there today and do the best we can.
translation.zh:
‎我只是希望大家上场
‎尽我们最大的能力

translation.en: I really think we have a shot.
But we have to work as a team.
That means no more of this.
And no more of whatever this is.
translation.zh: ‎也不能继续这样 不管这是什么

translation.en: -It's nothing. -Nothing?
Well, it's not nothing--
That. No more of that.
I really believe in us.
We can do this.
That's adorable.
Isn't that adorable, Kezza?
Aw, it's so sweet, it's giving me a toothache. [laughs]
We'll see you out there?
We'll be the ones kicking sand in your faces.
translation.zh: ‎等着我们踢你们一脸沙子吧

translation.en: -[all laughing] -That was good, yeah.
-I swear. -No doubt about it.
-Did you see the look on Dylan's face-- -[Sasha] Quick, I need help!
translation.zh:
‎-你看到迪伦的表情了吗…
‎-快来帮我！

translation.en: It's my friend! He's trapped!
Sorry, kid, this ain't our jurisdiction.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 孩子 这事不归我们管

translation.en: Please. I can't ask Malibu Rescue.
translation.zh:
‎求求你们
‎我不能请马里布救生队帮忙

translation.en: They're idiots. I need someone awesome, like you guys.
translation.zh: ‎他们是白痴 ‎我需要厉害的人 比如你们

translation.en: Well, uh, we are pretty awesome. [chuckles]
Come on, mates. We can pull off a quick rescue before the champos.
translation.zh:
‎来吧 伙计们 我们可以在锦标赛之前
‎来一场快速救援

translation.en: -Yeah, let's do it. -Yeah.
[Wayno] Let's do it, team.
-He's in there. -[slamming door]
[Jeffy] Help! I'm stuck!
Let's go, team!
Hang tight, grommet! We're coming for ya!
translation.zh: ‎挺住 小冲浪手！我们来救你了！

translation.en: -[Wayno] There's no grommet in here. -[Kezza] Where is he?
translation.zh:
‎-这里面没有冲浪手
‎-他去哪儿了？

translation.en: -[Wayno] Hold on! -[all shouting] No, no!
Dummies.
Thanks for your help, Jeffy.
Please, call me Jeff.
You think maybe sometime we could...
-Nope. -[music stops] Okay, then.
I'm here with Roger Gossard, the new senior captain of Malibu Rescue,
translation.zh:
‎我旁边的这位是罗杰·歌萨德
‎马里布救生队的新任高级队长

translation.en: and the host of this year's Beachmaster.
translation.zh: ‎也是今年海滩大师杯的主办人

translation.en: So, Roger, the big question on everybody's mind is,
will Team USA take the title for a historic fifth straight year?
translation.zh:
‎美国队会创造历史
‎连续第五年夺得冠军吗？

translation.en: I mean, is that really the question on everybody's mind?
I mean, what about just getting out there,
doing your best, and having a great time? [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎拼尽全力 然后玩得开心？

translation.en: Yeah, nobody cares about that.
Where are the Aussies?
I don't see them.
Hey, wait a minute.
Sasha, what did you do to the Australians?
translation.zh: ‎萨莎 你对那些澳洲人做什么了？

translation.en: Let's just say you don't have to worry about them anymore.
translation.zh: ‎这么说吧 你们不需要再担心他们了

translation.en: All week, you guys have been treating me like I'm too little to help out around here.
translation.zh:
‎这整周 你们都把我当小屁孩儿
‎觉得我完全帮不上忙

translation.en: But I just did the one thing you guys couldn't: I beat Team Australia.
translation.zh:
‎但我刚刚做了一件你们做不来的事：
‎打败了澳洲队

translation.en: How does that make me the bad guy?
Because you tricked them and locked them in a shipping container!
translation.zh:
‎因为你陷害了他们
‎把他们锁在了货柜箱里面！

translation.en: That is classic bad guy behavior.
Where is this thing?
It was right there.
What do you mean was? Where'd it go?
translation.zh: ‎原来是什么意思？它去哪儿了？

translation.en: Guys? I think I found it.
You've gotta be kidding me. Come on.
What're you doing here? Why aren't you competing?
translation.zh: ‎来这儿干什么？怎么不去比赛？

translation.en: We got a situation, Vooch.
translation.zh: ‎伍奇 我们遇上了紧急情况

translation.en: With 20 national anthems out of the way, it's finally time to begin.
translation.zh:
‎唱完了20个国家的国歌
‎比赛终于可以开始了

translation.en: Teams take to the course two at a time.
But they're really racing the clock.
translation.zh: ‎但他们的对手不是彼此 而是时间

translation.en: The Beachmaster kicks off with a Tire Run into a Commando Crawl,
translation.zh:
‎海滩大师杯比赛从轮胎障碍开始
‎到匍匐前进

translation.en: followed by a Cargo Net Climb, then it's over the Balance Beam...
up the Wall, and across the Rings to the Finish line.
translation.zh: ‎上墙 再穿过吊环到终点

translation.en: At the end of the competition, the team with the fastest time
translation.zh: ‎在比赛最后 用时最少的队伍

translation.en: will be crowned the Beachmaster!
First up, Israel and France.
translation.zh: ‎最先登场的是以色列和法国

translation.en: [scoffs] France?
USA! USA! USA!
Get up next to him. Try to get him to pull over.
translation.zh: ‎开到他旁边 我们试着让他停车

translation.en: [all] Stop! Stop! Please!
Stop the truck!
Can you hear us?
Hey!
Hey!
[all] Stop!
-[Lizzie] Stop the truck! -He doesn't see us!
We gotta stop him before he gets to the port
or that container's gonna end up on a ship to who knows where.
translation.zh:
‎不然集装箱就要被装上船
‎谁知道会运到哪儿

translation.en: -Hello? -Stop the truck!
[Dylan] Stop, please!
[announcer] A solid run by the South African team.
They just knocked France from the top slot.
translation.zh: ‎他们把法国从第一名的位置赶了下来

translation.en: Now with only six teams to go,
and an unbelievable time of 2:16:41,
South Africa has a strong chance of holding on to first place.
translation.zh:
‎他们有很大机会
‎可以稳稳地坐在第一名的位置

translation.en: They're almost up. Where are they?
Vooch, I have an idea.
I'm gonna jump.
What?
Tyler, you cannot jump from a moving bus onto a truck!
translation.zh:
‎泰勒 你不能从移动的大巴
‎跳到货柜车上！

translation.en: It's crazy!
I have to. It's the only way.
translation.zh: ‎我必须这么做 只有这办法了

translation.en: Is it? Is it the only way?
Does anybody have a better idea?
-Vooch, open the door. -[Vooch groans] Oh! Oh!
-Tyler, wait! -What?
Be careful.
